PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Sediments were collected in March 2003 by SCUBA divers at a depth of 15 m. The top 3-cm layer of the sediments was collected using acid-washed 500-ml polyethylene vials. Six replicate samples were collected at each site.

Aliquots of the dried sediments (500 ± 3 mg) were placed in acid-washed Teflon vials with 10 ml of 0.5 M Suprapur HCl (Merck). The sediments were then agitated at 200 rpm for 1 h at ambient temperature using an orbital shaker.
